概述  软件包   类  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

org.athrun.android.framework.webview
类 By

java.lang.Object
  org.athrun.android.framework.webview.By

public abstract class By
extends java.lang.Object

Used in conjunction with the web methods. Examples are By.id(String id) and By.cssSelector(String selector).

作者：
xiaoliang.chenxl

public By()
方法详细信息

id

public static By id(java.lang.String id)
Select a WebElement by its id.

参数：
id - the id of the web element
返回：
the Id object

xpath

public static By xpath(java.lang.String xpath)
Select a WebElement by its xpath.

参数：
xpath - the xpath of the web element
返回：
the Xpath object

cssSelector

public static By cssSelector(java.lang.String selectors)
Select a WebElement by its css selector.

参数：
selectors - the css selector of the web element
返回：
the CssSelector object

name

public static By name(java.lang.String name)
Select a WebElement by its name.

参数：
name - the name of the web element
返回：
the Name object

className

public static By className(java.lang.String className)
Select a WebElement by its class name.

参数：
className - the class name of the web element
返回：
the ClassName object

textContent

public static By textContent(java.lang.String textContent)
Select a WebElement by its text content.

参数：
textContent - the text content of the web element
返回：
the TextContent object

tagName

public static By tagName(java.lang.String tagName)
Select a WebElement by its tag name.

参数：
tagName - the tag name of the web element
返回：
